definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Lets take an example to understand keyword research better.
sentences.chinese: 讓舉一個例子牛鼻子字研究比較好的。

sentences.english: The first step in the Keyword selection process is a good Keyword Research.
sentences.chinese: 牛鼻子字選擇程序的第一個步驟是好牛鼻子字研究。

sentences.english: The first step in the Keyword selection process is a good Keyword Research.
sentences.chinese: 牛鼻子字選擇程序的第一個步驟是好牛鼻子字研究。

sentences.english: Hence it makes more sense to optimize for specific keywords.
sentences.chinese: 因此它製造較多的感覺爲特定的牛鼻子字最佳化。

sentences.english: This is then followed by keyword rich body text.
sentences.chinese: 這被牛鼻子字富有的身體本文然後跟隨。
